Momocs

Selects (ala dplyr) on Momocs objects

Select variables by name, from the $fac. See examples and ?dplyr::select.

select(.data, ...)

Arguments

.data

a Coo, Coe, PCA object
...

comma separated list of unquoted expressions

Value

a Momocs object of the same class.

Details

dplyr verbs are maintained.

See also

Other handling functions: arrange, at_least, chop, combine, dissolve, filter, mutate, rename, rescale, rm_harm, rm_uncomplete, rw_fac, sample_frac, sample_n, slice, subset.Coo, table

Examples

olea
#> An Opn object with: 
#>  - $coo: 210 open outlines (99 +/- 4 coordinates)
#>  - $fac: 4 classifiers:
#>      'var' (factor 4): Aglan, Cypre, MouBo1, PicMa.
#>      'domes' (factor 2): cult, wild.
#>      'view' (factor 2): VD, VL.
#>      'ind' (factor 30): O1, O10, O11, O12, O13, O14, O15, O16, O17, O18, O19 ... + 19 more.
select(olea, var, view) # drops domes and ind
#> An Opn object with: 
#>  - $coo: 210 open outlines (99 +/- 4 coordinates)
#>  - $fac: 2 classifiers:
#>      'var' (factor 4): Aglan, Cypre, MouBo1, PicMa.
#>      'view' (factor 2): VD, VL.
select(olea, variety=var, domesticated_status=domes, view)
#> An Opn object with: 
#>  - $coo: 210 open outlines (99 +/- 4 coordinates)
#>  - $fac: 3 classifiers:
#>      'variety' (factor 4): Aglan, Cypre, MouBo1, PicMa.
#>      'domesticated_status' (factor 2): cult, wild.
#>      'view' (factor 2): VD, VL.
# combine with filter with magrittr pipes
# only dorsal views, and 'var' and 'domes' columns
filter(olea, view=="VD") %>% select(var, domes)
#> An Opn object with: 
#>  - $coo: 120 open outlines (99 +/- 3 coordinates)
#>  - $fac: 2 classifiers:
#>      'var' (factor 4): Aglan, Cypre, MouBo1, PicMa.
#>      'domes' (factor 2): cult, wild.
head(olea$fac)
#>     var domes view ind
#> 1 Aglan  cult   VD O10
#> 2 Aglan  cult   VL O10
#> 3 Aglan  cult   VD O11
#> 4 Aglan  cult   VL O11
#> 5 Aglan  cult   VD O12
#> 6 Aglan  cult   VL O12
# select some columns
select(olea, domes, view)
#> An Opn object with: 
#>  - $coo: 210 open outlines (99 +/- 4 coordinates)
#>  - $fac: 2 classifiers:
#>      'domes' (factor 2): cult, wild.
#>      'view' (factor 2): VD, VL.
# remove some columns
select(olea, -ind)
#> An Opn object with: 
#>  - $coo: 210 open outlines (99 +/- 4 coordinates)
#>  - $fac: 3 classifiers:
#>      'var' (factor 4): Aglan, Cypre, MouBo1, PicMa.
#>      'domes' (factor 2): cult, wild.
#>      'view' (factor 2): VD, VL.
# rename on the fly and select some columns
# you can use rename instead
select(olea, foo=domes)
#> An Opn object with: 
#>  - $coo: 210 open outlines (99 +/- 4 coordinates)
#>  - $fac: 1 classifier:
#>      'foo' (factor 2): cult, wild.
